Statement.Sql: INSERT INTO LOOKUP (mUpdated,mGroup,mName,mDisplay,mAbbreviation,mDescription,mSort,mAltId) VALUES (CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,?,?,?,?,?,?,?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE mDisplay=?,mAbbreviation=?,mDescription=?,mSort=?,mAltId=?,mUpdated=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
select * from LOOKUP where mGroup=? order by mSort, mDisplay
select * from LOOKUP where mGroup=? and mName=? order by mSort
select distinct mGroup from LOOKUP order by mGroup
INSERT INTO LOOKUP_XL (mUpdated,mGroup,mName,mDisplay,mXL) VALUES (CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,?,?,?,?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE mDisplay=?,mXL=?,mUpdated=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
select * from LOOKUP_XL where mGroup=? and mName=?
